page.title: 03POPULATION Question. cont.
page.content: answers.58 parents did attend Walgrave School and 269 parents didn't. Q,5) We asked in which town or village people work, and got 217 answers. 57 worked in Walgrave, probably on a farm or in the local belt factory. 77 worked in Northampton,13 in Kettering and 9 in Wellingborough. 39 people worked out of the area, including London, Luton, Warrington and Surrey. The remainder worked in surrounding villages. Q.6) We asked how far people travel to work and got 181 replies. 34 people travel between 0 and 2 miles, 119 people travel between 5 and 15 miles, 10 travel between 15 and 50 miles and 9 travel over 50 miles to work. Q.7) We had 250 replies to our question on how people got to work. 155 travelled by car, 46 either walked or used bicycles. 10 used public transport
